Nighlight/Rodimus:::

"A VORK!!!! SO ARE THEY BACK??? WHAT DID SHE SAY????? WHY IS SHE 
CONTROLING HER???"said shocked Rodimus while she took in arms his 
wife who was now in a deep sleep

complicated

that he

get it
